jp: マクシム・ゴーリキー

skills.name: Inherited Name (継承する名)
skills.text:
1. After firing a [Torpedo Salvo], increases all enemies damage received by 3% for 10 seconds.
2. After [Torpedo Salvo] hits a target, if a ship is sunk within 10 seconds, 100% chance to add an additional [Torpedo Charge] to self.
Can only proc once per battle

skills.name: Raising Firepower (加算し続ける)
skills.text: 1. During battle, increases self's [Main Battery] damage by 2% every second up to a maximum of 30 times.

skills.name: Double-bladed Sharpness (二刀流の切れ味)
skills.text:
1. When [Main Battery] hits, randomly choose between AP-shell or HE-shell. If fired after a [Torpedo Salvo], use both shells.
AP-shell: [Main Battery] damage increases by 20%.
HE-shell: When [Main Battery] hit, 100% chance to set target on [Fire]. [Fire] deals 110% of Firepower over 10 seconds.
